00031 DataVisualizer::DataVisualizer(MainWindow * parent, ElementDatabase& db)
00032         : QWidget(parent, Qt::Window),
00033           Ui::DataVisualizer(),
00034           mDB(&db),
00035           mMainWindow(parent)
00036 {
00037         setupUi(this);
00038         connect(cbCharacteristic, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(display(int)));
00039         cbCharacteristic->setCurrentIndex(initialSelection);
00040 }

00042 void
00043 outputRect(const QString& str, const QRectF& r) 
00044 {
00045         std::cerr << str.toStdString()
00046                 << " pos: (" << r.x() << "," << r.y() << ") dim: (" 
00047                 << r.width() << "," << r.height() << ")" << std::endl;
00048 }
00049 
00055 class PreparePropertyVariantForSorting: public boost::static_visitor<void>
00056 {
00057 public:
00058         void operator()(int& i) const {}
00059         void operator()(std::string& s) const {}
00060         void operator()(double& d) const {}
00063         void operator()(complex& c) const {
00064                 c = complex(c.real(), 0.0);
00065         }
00066 };
00067 
00068 void 
00069 DataVisualizer::display(int index)
00070 {
00071         if (!mDB || !cbCharacteristic) return;
00072 
00073         int propertyIndex(cbCharacteristic->itemData(index).toInt());
00074         if (propertyIndex < 0 || propertyIndex > Element::propertyCount())
00075                 return;
00076 
00077         // see if item should be drawn
00078         Element::Property p(Element::getProperty(propertyIndex));
00079         Element::PropertyType type(Element::propertyType(p));
00080 
00081         if (type == Element::COMPLEX_TYPE ||
00082             type == Element::STRING_TYPE) {
00083                 lblPlotType->setText(tr("[ Horizontal distances are <b>not</b> proportional to the values. ]"));
00084         } else {
00085                 lblPlotType->setText(tr("[ Horizontal distances are proportional to the values. ]"));
00086         }
00087 
00088         // reset graphics scene
00089         SceneType scene(new QGraphicsScene());
00090         SceneType oldScene(gvDisplay->scene());
00091         gvDisplay->setScene(scene);
00092         if (oldScene) delete oldScene;
00093 
00094         ElementDatabase::Iterator begin = mDB->begin();
00095         ElementDatabase::Iterator end = mDB->end();
00096         ElementDatabase::Iterator it = begin;
00097         // copy elements to sorted container first
00098         typedef QMultiMap<Element::PropertyVariant, Element::Ptr> ElementMap;
00099         ElementMap elemMap;
00100         for(; it != end; it++) 
00101         {
00102                 Element::Ptr elem(it.value());
00103                 if (elem.isNull()) continue;
00104                 Element::PropertyVariant prop = elem->propertyConst(p);
00105                 boost::apply_visitor(PreparePropertyVariantForSorting(), prop);
00106                 elemMap.insert(prop, elem);
00107         }
00108 
00109         // finally draw the elements
00110         qreal lastXPos = -1e10; // need an arbitrary small number
00111         ElementMap::const_iterator mapIter = elemMap.begin();
00112         for(; mapIter != elemMap.end(); mapIter++) 
00113         {
00114                 draw(scene, lastXPos, mapIter.value(), propertyIndex);
00115         }
00116         // get scene bounding box, add a margin
00117         QRectF sceneBoundingBox(scene->itemsBoundingRect());
00118         sceneBoundingBox.setWidth(sceneBoundingBox.width()+2*itemMargin);
00119         sceneBoundingBox.setHeight(sceneBoundingBox.height()+2*itemMargin);
00120         sceneBoundingBox.translate(-1.0*itemMargin, -1.0*itemMargin);
00121         scene->setSceneRect(sceneBoundingBox);
00122         gvDisplay->show();
00123         adjustSize();
00124 }
00125 
00130 class DrawingPositionFromPropertyVariant: public boost::static_visitor<QPointF>
00131 {
00132         static const qreal mScale = 50.0;
00133 public:
00134         QPointF operator()(const int& i) const {
00135                 return QPointF(qreal(i)*mScale, 0.0);
00136         }
00137         QPointF operator()(const std::string& s) const {
00138                 return QPointF(0.0, 0.0);
00139                 // using the operator for (const int&)
00140 //              return operator()(QString::fromStdString(s).toLower().at(0).toAscii()-('a'));
00141         }
00142         QPointF operator()(const double& d) const {
00143                 return QPointF(qreal(d)*mScale, 0.0);
00144         }
00145         QPointF operator()(const complex& c) const {
00146                 return QPointF(qreal(c.real())*mScale, 
00147                                qreal(c.imag())*mScale*-1.0);
00148         }
00149 };
00150 
00151 void 
00152 DataVisualizer::draw(SceneType scene, qreal& lastXPos, Element::Ptr e, int propertyIndex)
00153 {
00154         if (e.isNull()) return;
00155 
00156         // see if item should be drawn
00157         Element::Property p(Element::getProperty(propertyIndex));
00158         Element::PropertyType type(Element::propertyType(p));
00159         Element::PropertyVariant var(e->propertyConst(p));
00160 
00161         if (p == Element::NUCLEONS_PROPERTY && !e->isIsotope()) return;
00162         if (!Element::isValidVariant(var)) return;
00163 
00164         // build the text item
00165         QGraphicsItem * item(0);
00166         QGraphicsTextItem * text = new QGraphicsTextItem();
00167         text->setHtml( getLinkText(*e) + "<br>" +
00168                 mMainWindow->toString(var));
00169         text->setTextInteractionFlags(Qt::TextBrowserInteraction);
00170         text->setToolTip(tr("formattedFormulaToolTip"));
00171         connect(text, SIGNAL(linkActivated(const QString&)), 
00172                 this, SLOT(emitElementLinkActivated(const QString&)));
00173         item = text;
00174 
00175         // build the encapsulating box item
00176         QGraphicsRectItem * rect = new QGraphicsRectItem(
00177                 item->boundingRect() );
00178         rect->setBrush(QBrush(QColor(196, 255, 196)));
00179 
00180         // combine both and add them to the scene
00181         item->setParentItem(rect);
00182         scene->addItem(rect);
00183 
00184         QPointF pos(boost::apply_visitor(DrawingPositionFromPropertyVariant(), var));
00185         if (type == Element::COMPLEX_TYPE ||
00186             type == Element::STRING_TYPE) {
00187                 // no stacking for 2D drawing
00188                 // item positions are stretched in X direction
00189                 if (lastXPos > pos.x()) {
00190                         pos.setX(lastXPos);
00191                 }
00192                 rect->setPos(pos);
00193                 // update drawing position for the next item
00194                 lastXPos = pos.x() + rect->boundingRect().width() + itemMargin;
00195         } else {
00196                 setItemPos(rect, pos);
00197         }
00198 }
00199 
00200 void 
00201 DataVisualizer::adjustSize(void)
00202 {
00203         // determine the current difference between window size and viewport size
00204         int margin = size().height() - gvDisplay->viewport()->size().height();
00205         int scrollBarWidth = 0;
00206         // get scrollbar height offset
00207         QScrollBar * vscroll = gvDisplay->horizontalScrollBar();
00208         if (vscroll) scrollBarWidth = vscroll->sizeHint().height();
00209         margin += scrollBarWidth;
00210 
00211         QSize newSize(size());
00212         // update height only
00213         newSize.setHeight(int(gvDisplay->sceneRect().height()) + margin);
00214         // resize nescessary ?
00215         if (size().height() != newSize.height()) {
00216                 resize(newSize);
00217         }
00218 }
00219 
00220 void 
00221 DataVisualizer::setItemPos(QGraphicsItem * item, QPointF pos)
00222 {
00223         typedef QList<QGraphicsItem *> QGraphicsItemList;
00224         SceneType scene(gvDisplay->scene());
00225         if (!item || !scene) return;
00226         // set the desired position
00227         item->setPos(pos);
00228         // check for collisions with other items
00229         QList<QGraphicsItem *> collides = scene->collidingItems(item);
00230         if (collides.size() == 0) return;
00231         QGraphicsItem * cItem = 0;
00232         QGraphicsItemList::const_iterator it = collides.constBegin();
00233         while(it != collides.constEnd()) {
00234                 cItem = *it;
00235                 if (cItem && !cItem->parentItem()) break;
00236                 it++;
00237         }
00238         if (!cItem || cItem->parentItem()) return;
00239         // item has no parent => top-level, bounding rect
00240         qreal newYPos = cItem->y() + 
00241                         0.5*cItem->boundingRect().height() + 
00242                         0.5*item->boundingRect().height() +
00243                         itemMargin;
00244         QPointF newPos(pos);
00245         newPos.setY(newYPos);
00246         setItemPos(item, newPos);
00247 }

00249 void 
00250 DataVisualizer::show()
00251 {
00252         QWidget::show();
00253         selectIndex(initialSelection);
00254 }
00255 
00256 void 
00257 DataVisualizer::selectIndex(int index)
00258 {
00259         cbCharacteristic->setCurrentIndex(index);
00260         display(index);
00261 }

00263 void 
00264 DataVisualizer::emitElementLinkActivated(const QString& link)
00265 {
00266         emit elementLinkActivated(link);
00267 }
00268 
00269 QString 
00270 DataVisualizer::getLinkText(const cfp::ChemicalElementInterface& e)
00271 {
00272         QString s;
00273         s.append("<style>a{text-decoration:none;}</style><a href=\"");
00274         s.append(ElementDatabase::makeKey(e));
00275         s.append("\">");
00276         s.append(e.toMarkup().c_str());
00277         s.append("</a>");
00278         return s;
00279 }

00281 void 
00282 DataVisualizer::retranslateUi()
00283 {
00284         Ui::DataVisualizer::retranslateUi(this);
00285 
00286         int selectedIndex = cbCharacteristic->currentIndex();
00287         // remove all characteristics items first, add the retranslated again
00288         cbCharacteristic->clear();
00289         int count = Element::propertyCount()-1;
00290         for(int i=0; i < count; i++)
00291         {
00292                 cbCharacteristic->insertItem(
00293                         cbCharacteristic->count(), 
00294                         tr(Element::propertyName(Element::getProperty(i))), 
00295                         QVariant(i));
00296         }
00297 
00298         // redisplay the data
00299         selectIndex(selectedIndex);
00300 }
